titles: A warning to all priests and jesuites, by the example of two masse-priests which for seducing and stealing away the hearts of the Kings loyall subjects, were hangd, drawne, and quartered: whose execution was on Friday, being the 21. day of January, 1642. To the tune of, A rich marchant man.
publisher: Printed at London for Fr. Grove, dwelling on [...] hill,
notes: O copy, reel 2450, is torn at edge slightly affecting text.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Jesuits --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
Church and state --  Early works to 1800.
